## Context.IContextMatchOptions.acceptDefaultScore property

If true, then conditions which would otherwise yield [NoMatch](./ts-res.nomatch.md) but have a defined [scoreAsDefault](./ts-res.conditions.condition.scoreasdefault.md) will yield `scoreAsDefault`<!-- -->instead of `NoMatch`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
acceptDefaultScore?: boolean;
```
